EmailTemplate.name: MGI Registration Payment Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Payment Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Outbound_Notification__c.Contact_First_Name__c} {!Outbound_Notification__c.Contact_Last_Name__c}
I hereby confirm that we have received your R800 registration fee. Please note this fee is non-refundable.
To secure your registration for {!Outbound_Notification__c.Current_Date_Year__c}, please submit the following documentation and make the following payment and as soon as possible so that we can process your student number:
• Completed and signed registration forms • Signed Repayment Calculator • Signed Addendum A • Signed Social Indemnity form • A copy of student’s ID • A copy of sponsor’s ID
Please contact me in order to confirm that I have received all documentation after it has been sent. Faxed and e-mailed documentation will be accepted; however the originals must be submitted upon enrolment on {!Outbound_Notification__c.Academic_Start_Date__c}.
In order to secure the {!Outbound_Notification__c.Earlybird__c} fees, an early-bird deposit is required on or before {!Outbound_Notification__c.Early_Bird_Date__c}. The early-bird deposit, excluding the registration fee, will be deducted from the first month’s payment. Please note however, failure to pay the early-bird deposit will result in the {!Outbound_Notification__c.Academic_Start_Date_Year__c} fees being applicable (estimated increase of 8%-15% in {!Outbound_Notification__c.Current_Date_Year__c}).
If you require any further information please do not hesitate to contact me.
Kind Regards {!Outbound_Notification__c.Sender_Name__c} {!Outbound_Notification__c.Campus__c} {!Outbound_Notification__c.Sender_Email__c}
